name: Stream Out
description:
Outputs current game information so that it can be used as a dynamic source in broadcasting software that has
file monitoring capabilities.
A guild's Message of the Day can contain text enclosed in [public]text here[/public] to signal this module permission to export it.
If the [public] region is not found or set incorrectly the 'guild_motd.txt' will not contain any text.
Similarly, other exported text and image files will also be cleared to reflect specific toggles and changes (eg. not representing a guild will clear 'guild_emblem.png', not commanding a squad will clear 'commander_icon.png',
and so on).

account.details: Always required if any other permission is present.

characters.details: Needed to record your death count.

progression.details: Needed to record your kill count in PvP and WvW.

pvp.details: Needed to request your SPvP standings.

wallet.details: Needed to record the amount of gold, silver and copper in your possession.

guilds.details: Needed to request image resources required to render your current represented guild's' emblem.
